meanings.sent1: Apicultures require patience and care to maintain healthy hives.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy learning about apicultures as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The apicultures in the backyard are buzzing with activity!
meanings.sent4: In the world of apicultures, each hive is like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The sweet rewards of apicultures make all the hard work worthwhile.

meanings.definition: The management and cultivation of bees for honey production.
meanings.sent1: Successful apicultures involve ensuring bees have enough flowers to pollinate.
meanings.sent2: Local farmers rely on apicultures for their honey supply.
meanings.sent3: The apicultures on the farm are abuzz with activity!
meanings.sent4: The art of apicultures turns nature's work into golden sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The buzzing sound of apicultures working fills the air on sunny days.

meanings.definition: The study and science of bees and their behavior.
meanings.sent1: Researchers dedicate their lives to understanding apicultures and their impact on ecosystems.
meanings.sent2: Children can learn a lot about nature through studying apicultures.
meanings.sent3: The apicultures exhibit fascinating social structures within their hives.
meanings.sent4: Exploring apicultures is like unlocking the secrets of a tiny world.
meanings.sent5: The intricate dance of apicultures reveals the wonders of nature.
